edge_1: Christian takes Ana to Esclava, a beauty salon owned by Elena Lincoln. A family friend, she is also Christian's former dominant who introduced him to the BDSM lifestyle by sexually assaulting him when he was a minor. Ana is furious that Christian took her there, and that they are business partners after all that.
edge_2: Back at work Ana is promoted to acting editor in his place after she refused to attend the expo with Jack, causing some tension between her and Christian when he tell her she shouldn't go.
